tool_description: HTML2PDF allows you to create PDF files from HTML and CSS. You can create automatic reports or invoices for your users just by using the tools you already know. We are still in Alpha, new features are added every day.
name: HTML2PDF
title: HTML2PDF

api_list.name: download
api_list.description: Downloads the PDF file you created

required_parameters.name: filename
required_parameters.description: Name of the PDF file you created and want to download. The filename is provided in response to the render request
